forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 64. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco awakens under a muted sky, as a delicate drizzle dances its way to the earth before giving way to fleeting moments of sunshine. A gentle breeze carries the salty whispers of the ocean, stirring the air and creating a serene atmosphere tinged with the nostalgia of bygone days. Today’s anticipated high rests comfortably around 64 degrees, ideal for strolling the streets wrapped in a light sweater or jacket, and perhaps a scarf to fend off the afternoon chill as the marine layer looms ever so close.

As the day unfolds, clouds may reclaim the landscape, casting much of the city in a soft, whispering gray that hints at the likelihood of light drizzle later on. Even with such muted light, it invites you to delve into the soul of the city—exploring tucked-away cafés or perhaps indulging in a historical museum, where the stories of old await beneath the watchful gaze of the fog. As evening approaches, the bursts of wind may tease the flora that frames our urban haven, leaving one to ponder the beauty of simplicity in a world often rushing forward. So, grasp this modernity with an embrace of layers, and dare to venture forth; even in the gray, there lies a charm that beckons.
